The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Crystal impling jar
This article is about the jarred impling. For the creature, see Crystal impling.
Crystal impling jar

The crystal impling jar is the result of successfully catching a crystal impling, while also having an empty impling jar. Level 80 Hunter is required to catch them.

Contents

  • 1 Loot
    • 1.1 Impling jar
    • 1.2 Main drops
    • 1.3 Tertiary
  • 2 Changes
  • 3 References

Loot[edit | edit source]

At current Grand Exchange prices, opening a crystal impling jar gives 78,006 worth of loot on average. If you include growing the Crystal acorns , you can use Crystal shards to create Divine potions, this increases the value to 96,771.

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

Impling jar[edit | edit source]

An empty impling jar is returned when removing the loot, with a 10% chance of it breaking.[1]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Impling jar19/109450

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 March 2020
(update | poll)

The loot table of crystal implings now includes crystal shards and acorns.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 4 November 2018. (Archived from the original on 23 July 2019.) Mod Ash: "[What are the chances of an impling jar breaking when opening it?] 10% flat rate, I think."
